q_ch: 对于所有Expert Cutters负责的且尚未完成的裁剪任务，共分配了哪些原料，按照裁剪任务进行整理？
q_en: Which materials have been allocated for all cutting tasks that are assigned to Expert Cutters and have not been completed, organized by cutting task?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the materials allocated for the cutting tasks assigned to the "Expert Cutters" group that haven't been completed yet. Here's a neat table to show you the details:

| Cutting Task ID | Material Name       |
|-----------------|---------------------|
| 8               | Denim Fabric        |
| 11              | Wool                |
| 11              | Silk                |
| 16              | Down                |
| 16              | Wool                |
| 16              | Leather             |
| 19              | Cotton Fabric       |
| 19              | Synthetic Fiber     |
| 20              | Wool                |
| 20              | Leather             |
| 21              | Cotton Fabric       |
| 21              | Synthetic Fiber     |
| 26              | Wool                |
| 27              | Wool                |
| 27              | Leather             |
| 27              | Down                |
| 34              | Cotton Fabric       |
| 34              | Synthetic Fiber     |

I hope this helps you get a clear picture of the materials in action! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Expert Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group named "Expert Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '4' AND status != 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs for tasks assigned to "Expert Cutters" that have not been completed

steps.sql: SELECT cma.cutting_task_id, wm.material_id, m.name FROM cutting_material_allocation cma JOIN warehouse_material wm ON cma.warehouse_material_id = wm.id JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id WHERE cma.cutting_task_id IN (8, 11, 16, 19, 20, 21, 26, 27, 34);
steps.description: Retrieve the material allocations for the retrieved cutting tasks
